title: The Big Shots (1972 Crime film) French Movie by Serge Reggiani, Juliet Berto, Patrick Bouchitey

sources.title: The Big Shots (1972 Crime film) French Movie by Serge Reggiani, Juliet Berto, Patrick Bouchitey
sources.description:
Thia and Murelli make a living from car stunt shows, but also supplement their income by carrying out small burglaries. One day, Thia comes across a scene of jealousy where Jock kills his wife and her lover. Instead of reporting the crime, Thia decides to help Jock escape and takes him in. Jock falls in love with Celia, the gangster Nino Murelli's daughter, and the young couple assists the two friends in one last big heist. However, nothing goes as planned.

Original title: Les ca√Øds (1972) AKA: The Big Shots / The Hell Below

This film has French audio, and subtitles in many languages.

Director: Robert Enrico
Writers: M.G. Braun, Robert Enrico, Pierre Pelegri
Stars: Serge Reggiani, Juliet Berto, Jean Bouise, Patrick Bouchitey
Genres: French cinema, Crime, Drama, Literary
